service_identity: INT. (Indus Net Technologies) is a full-stack software engineering solutions company that provides digital transformation services. It offers a range of services including technology, data analytics, cloud solutions, cybersecurity, and digital marketing. The service is designed for businesses looking to enhance their digital presence and operational efficiency across various industries.
service_capabilities: The service includes capabilities in custom application design and development, data analytics, cloud management, and digital marketing. It offers features such as UI/UX design, data lake implementation, predictive analytics, and managed cloud services. Additionally, it provides project management, governance, risk, and compliance services, along with ongoing technical support and updates.
service_technologies: The technologies used include a variety of programming languages such as Java, Python, and JavaScript, as well as frameworks like React, Angular, and Django. It utilizes cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform for infrastructure management. Tools for data analytics include Power BI, Tableau, and TensorFlow, among others, for AI and machine learning applications.
service_intent: The service aims to deliver digital success by enhancing operational efficiency and enabling businesses to adapt to changing market demands. It focuses on providing scalable and secure solutions that drive innovation and improve customer engagement. The ultimate goal is to help clients achieve their business objectives through effective digital transformation.
service_problems: The service addresses challenges such as inefficient processes, lack of data integration, and the need for enhanced customer engagement. It solves pain points related to digital transformation, including the complexities of managing cloud infrastructure and ensuring data security. Additionally, it tackles issues of compliance and risk management in digital operations.
service_industries: INT. serves various industries including insurance, life sciences, consumer packaged goods (CPG), banking and financial services, education, manufacturing, and real estate. Its solutions are tailored to meet the specific needs of these sectors, providing industry-relevant applications and services. The company also focuses on emerging segments to expand its reach.
service_usecases: Use cases include the development of customer engagement platforms for insurance, digital banking solutions for financial services, and telemedicine platforms for healthcare. The service has been applied in creating personalized marketing strategies for CPG companies and implementing data-driven underwriting tools. Additionally, it has facilitated the integration of digital sales platforms across various industries.
service_figures: INT. has been recognized for triple-digit revenue growth over three years and has received multiple awards for its innovative IT products. The company has completed over 11,000 client projects and serves more than 500 clients globally. It has also been acknowledged as one of the top SMEs in digital transformation services in India.
